enumeration.items: polyline_form circular_arc elliptic_arc parabolic_arc hyperbolic_arc unspecified
plane_surf cylindrical_surf conical_surf spherical_surf toroidal_surf surf_of_revolution ruled_surf generalised_cone quadric_surf surf_of_linear_extrusion unspecified

where.label: wr1
where.expression: (EXISTS(internal_location) OR EXISTS(street_number) OR EXISTS( street) OR EXISTS(postal_box) OR EXISTS(town) OR EXISTS( region) OR EXISTS(postal_code) OR EXISTS(country) OR EXISTS( facsimile_number) OR EXISTS(telephone_number) OR EXISTS( electronic_mail_address) OR EXISTS(telex_number))

where.label: wr2
where.expression: (SIZEOF(QUERY ( elp_fbnds <* QUERY ( bnds <* bounds | ( 'TOPOLOGICALLY_BOUNDED_SURFACE_MIM.EDGE_LOOP' IN TYPEOF( bnds.bound)) ) | (NOT (SIZEOF(QUERY ( oe <* elp_fbnds.bound \path.edge_list | (NOT ( 'TOPOLOGICALLY_BOUNDED_SURFACE_MIM.EDGE_CURVE' IN TYPEOF(oe \oriented_edge.edge_element))) )) = 0)) )) = 0)

where.label: wr3
where.expression: (SIZEOF(QUERY ( elp_fbnds <* QUERY ( bnds <* bounds | ( 'TOPOLOGICALLY_BOUNDED_SURFACE_MIM.EDGE_LOOP' IN TYPEOF( bnds.bound)) ) | (NOT (SIZEOF(QUERY ( oe <* elp_fbnds.bound \path.edge_list | (NOT (SIZEOF([ 'TOPOLOGICALLY_BOUNDED_SURFACE_MIM.LINE', 'TOPOLOGICALLY_BOUNDED_SURFACE_MIM.CONIC', 'TOPOLOGICALLY_BOUNDED_SURFACE_MIM.POLYLINE', 'TOPOLOGICALLY_BOUNDED_SURFACE_MIM.SURFACE_CURVE', 'TOPOLOGICALLY_BOUNDED_SURFACE_MIM.B_SPLINE_CURVE'] * TYPEOF(oe.edge_element\edge_curve.edge_geometry)) = 1)) )) = 0)) )) = 0)

where.label: wr4
where.expression: (SIZEOF(QUERY ( elp_fbnds <* QUERY ( bnds <* bounds | ( 'TOPOLOGICALLY_BOUNDED_SURFACE_MIM.EDGE_LOOP' IN TYPEOF( bnds.bound)) ) | (NOT (SIZEOF(QUERY ( oe <* elp_fbnds.bound \path.edge_list | (NOT (( 'TOPOLOGICALLY_BOUNDED_SURFACE_MIM.VERTEX_POINT' IN TYPEOF( oe\edge.edge_start)) AND ( 'TOPOLOGICALLY_BOUNDED_SURFACE_MIM.CARTESIAN_POINT' IN TYPEOF(oe\edge.edge_start\vertex_point.vertex_geometry)) AND ('TOPOLOGICALLY_BOUNDED_SURFACE_MIM.VERTEX_POINT' IN TYPEOF(oe\edge.edge_end)) AND ( 'TOPOLOGICALLY_BOUNDED_SURFACE_MIM.CARTESIAN_POINT' IN TYPEOF(oe\edge.edge_end\vertex_point.vertex_geometry)))) )) = 0)) )) = 0)

where.label: wr5
where.expression: (SIZEOF(QUERY ( elp_fbnds <* QUERY ( bnds <* bounds | ( 'TOPOLOGICALLY_BOUNDED_SURFACE_MIM.EDGE_LOOP' IN TYPEOF( bnds.bound)) ) | ( 'TOPOLOGICALLY_BOUNDED_SURFACE_MIM.ORIENTED_PATH' IN TYPEOF(elp_fbnds.bound)) )) = 0)

where.label: wr7
where.expression: (SIZEOF(QUERY ( vlp_fbnds <* QUERY ( bnds <* bounds | ( 'TOPOLOGICALLY_BOUNDED_SURFACE_MIM.VERTEX_LOOP' IN TYPEOF( bnds.bound)) ) | (NOT (( 'TOPOLOGICALLY_BOUNDED_SURFACE_MIM.VERTEX_POINT' IN TYPEOF( vlp_fbnds\face_bound.bound\vertex_loop.loop_vertex)) AND ( 'TOPOLOGICALLY_BOUNDED_SURFACE_MIM.CARTESIAN_POINT' IN TYPEOF(vlp_fbnds\face_bound.bound\vertex_loop.loop_vertex\ vertex_point.vertex_geometry)))) )) = 0)

where.label: wr9
where.expression: (SIZEOF(QUERY ( elp_fbnds <* QUERY ( bnds <* bounds | ( 'TOPOLOGICALLY_BOUNDED_SURFACE_MIM.EDGE_LOOP' IN TYPEOF( bnds.bound)) ) | (NOT (SIZEOF(QUERY ( oe <* elp_fbnds.bound \path.edge_list | (( 'TOPOLOGICALLY_BOUNDED_SURFACE_MIM.SURFACE_CURVE' IN TYPEOF(oe\oriented_edge.edge_element\edge_curve. edge_geometry)) AND (NOT (SIZEOF(QUERY ( sc_ag <* oe. edge_element\edge_curve.edge_geometry\surface_curve. associated_geometry | (NOT ( 'TOPOLOGICALLY_BOUNDED_SURFACE_MIM.PCURVE' IN TYPEOF(sc_ag))) )) = 0))) )) = 0)) )) = 0)

where.label: wr10
where.expression: (((NOT ('TOPOLOGICALLY_BOUNDED_SURFACE_MIM.SWEPT_SURFACE' IN TYPEOF(face_geometry))) OR (NOT ( 'TOPOLOGICALLY_BOUNDED_SURFACE_MIM.POLYLINE' IN TYPEOF( face_geometry\swept_surface.swept_curve))) OR (SIZEOF( face_geometry\swept_surface.swept_curve\polyline.points) >= 3)) AND (SIZEOF(QUERY ( elp_fbnds <* QUERY ( bnds <* bounds | ('TOPOLOGICALLY_BOUNDED_SURFACE_MIM.EDGE_LOOP' IN TYPEOF(bnds.bound)) ) | (NOT (SIZEOF(QUERY ( oe <* elp_fbnds.bound\path.edge_list | (( 'TOPOLOGICALLY_BOUNDED_SURFACE_MIM.POLYLINE' IN TYPEOF(oe\ oriented_edge.edge_element\edge_curve.edge_geometry)) AND ( NOT (SIZEOF(oe\oriented_edge.edge_element\edge_curve. edge_geometry\polyline.points) >= 3))) )) = 0)) )) = 0))

where.label: wr1
where.expression: (('TOPOLOGICALLY_BOUNDED_SURFACE_MIM.UNIFORM_CURVE' IN TYPEOF( SELF)) OR ( 'TOPOLOGICALLY_BOUNDED_SURFACE_MIM.QUASI_UNIFORM_CURVE' IN TYPEOF(SELF)) OR ( 'TOPOLOGICALLY_BOUNDED_SURFACE_MIM.BEZIER_CURVE' IN TYPEOF( SELF)) OR ('TOPOLOGICALLY_BOUNDED_SURFACE_MIM.B_SPLINE_CURVE_WITH_KNOTS' IN TYPEOF(SELF)))

where.label: wr1
where.expression: (('TOPOLOGICALLY_BOUNDED_SURFACE_MIM.UNIFORM_SURFACE' IN TYPEOF(SELF)) OR ( 'TOPOLOGICALLY_BOUNDED_SURFACE_MIM.QUASI_UNIFORM_SURFACE' IN TYPEOF(SELF)) OR ( 'TOPOLOGICALLY_BOUNDED_SURFACE_MIM.BEZIER_SURFACE' IN TYPEOF(SELF)) OR ('TOPOLOGICALLY_BOUNDED_SURFACE_MIM.B_SPLINE_SURFACE_WITH_KNOTS' IN TYPEOF(SELF)))

where.label: wr1
where.expression: (((NOT closed_curve) AND (SIZEOF(QUERY ( temp <* segments | ( temp.transition = discontinuous) )) = 1)) OR (closed_curve AND (SIZEOF(QUERY ( temp <* segments | (temp.transition = discontinuous) )) = 0)))

rule.name: compatible_dimension
rule.algorithm: WHERE wr1: (SIZEOF(QUERY ( x <* cartesian_point | (SIZEOF(QUERY ( y <* geometric_representation_context | (item_in_context(x,y) AND ( HIINDEX(x.coordinates) <> y.coordinate_space_dimension)) )) > 0) )) = 0); wr2: (SIZEOF(QUERY ( x <* direction | (SIZEOF(QUERY ( y <* geometric_representation_context | (item_in_context(x,y) AND ( HIINDEX(x.direction_ratios) <> y.coordinate_space_dimension)) )) > 0) )) = 0);
